Uses of Interface
com.autonomy.aci.client.services.Processor

  • Packages that use Processor 
    Package Description
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services
    API classes and interfaces for ACI services.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl
    Core implementation of the AciService interface.

    • Uses of Processor in com.autonomy.aci.client.services

      Subinterfaces of Processor in com.autonomy.aci.client.services 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StAXProcessor<T>
      Defines methods that StAX based ACI response processors should implement.

    • Uses of Processor in com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl

      Classes in com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl that implement Processor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStAXProcessor<T>
      Abstract Processor that should be used by all processors wanting to process the ACI response via the JSR173 StAX API.
      class  BinaryResponseProcessor
      Takes an ACI response and returns it as a byte array.
      class  ByteArrayProcessor
      Takes an ACI response and returns it as a byte array.
      class  DocumentProcessor
      Processor implementation that converts an ACI response into a DOM Document for further processing either directly via DOM or via XPath.
      class  ErrorProcessor
      Processes an ACI Server error response into an AciErrorException.
